results.title: Vision. [No. 26]
results.creator_credit: Jim Strongin, Ted Steeg, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine: School of the Arts; Los Angeles Freeway; fish farming with the Lummis - an Indian tgribe has mastered the science of fish-farming; frostbiting - people who sail all year round braving winter winds and temperatures; homesteading - deserted town houses are granted to citizens willing to make them liveable again; head in the stars - Ken Kulak, 12 years old, runs a planetarium and studies computer sciences and astronomy; Theater of the Deaf - a repertory company tours the world performing for deaf and non-deaf people alike.

results.title: Vision. [No. 24]
results.creator_credit: Ted Steeg, Tim Strongin, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine: Volunteers look after young abandoned eagles; New Pacemaker developed by the John Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory; a sheep farm family business in Bucks County, Pennsylvania; San Francisco preserves its heritage by retaining its cable cars; an island of peace minutes away from Times Square in New York City; A New York high school has a special class for young rock music composers.

results.title: Vision. [No. 22]
results.creator_credit: Jim Strongin, Ted Steeg, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine: the work and use of the radio telescope in West Virginia; a policewoman explains her job, training and off duty life in Washington; problems of the retired and the handicapped as tackled by the Retired Senior Volunteer Program; making dolls to reflect authentic period in American history; the cleaning up of Lake Washington by the community in Seattle and the 18 acre San Diego Wild Animal Park which aims to reproduce in captivity animals which otherwise might become extinct. Narrated by Michael Tolan.

results.title: Seven days before you die [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Nassiem Valamanesh, Andrei Gostin and MAPS
results.brief_description: A man recounts the 7 days leading up to his death when he is shadowed by a mysterious stranger in black. On day 6 he receives a strange package which instantly triggers a physical response, as well as strange visions which may or may not be related to the stranger. Cast includes Michael Kumnick, Roderick Ho’vell and a computer generated voice.

results.title: Seven [Widescreen] (D)
results.creator_credit: David Fincher, Arnold Kopelson, Phyllis Carlyle and New Line Cinema
results.brief_description: A serial killer is murdering people according to a deranged righteous rationale, punishing people for their indulgence in the seven deadly sins. Morgan Freeman is Detective Somerset, a police officer who has seen too much crime and has witnessed for too long the savagery of a decaying urban world. Brad Pitt is young Detective Mills, eager to prove his abilities and excited to have landed a fascinating if gruesome case. “Seven” is a film that portrays an almost misanthropic contempt for the contemporary world; a world in which spirituality is infused with vengeance and where relationships are tainted by exploitation. The nameless city is always dark and wet, and begins to resemble a vision of Hell. “Seven” includes stunning photography, electrifying editing and a meticulous soundtrack. The film confronts the viewer with the hateful extremeties of evil. It remains unforgettable because it also suggests that evil is not the prerogative of monsters. Co-starring Gwyneth Paltrow and a diabolically good Kevin Spacey. Do not miss the opening credit sequence.

results.title: With inertia
results.brief_description: A stylish exploration of life, death, friendship, drugs, work and unemployment. Five girls living in the city and on the edge, their fast and not so fast lives.

results.title: With Burning Patience
results.creator_credit: Antonio Skarmeta, Prole Film, Von Vietinghoff Filmproduktion and Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen
results.brief_description: A film of impassioned charm tracing the lives of little people caught up in large events. A haunting poetic drama which blends Chilean history at the time of the downfall of the Allende government in 1973, with a delicate village love story.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Antonio Skarmeta, Prole Film, Von Vietinghoff Filmproduktion and Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen

results.title: Witch hunt
results.brief_description: Presented by George Donikan, this documentary is a “Four Corners” style investigation into the so-called Greek Social Security Conspiracy Fraud. The whole story of the scandal and the role of the Federal Police and the Department of Social Security is explored in this documentary.
